text: Kei'n huoikajuotak Christian ulenai inkhat eii tia kilei Silas in nasan jarra hiwa kabong chemajia hi kimajia mator eii. Kei'n nangnidiang kanamasokzoot khat-um kei karingkhuo thurchi hi kanarilpizoot hiwa ngaihi inthiangnga Pathian riangwai kha eii. Hiwahin nangni'n kacheet-ah ngirru. Chuon 15:22,40
